entry.title: Ether On Exchanges Plummets To 4-Year Low Ahead Of The Merge
entry.summary: Ether held on exchanges has dropped 40% in the past year to 19M ETH.

entry.title: Feds Turn Up the Heat on Crypto with Insider Trading Case Against ex-Coinbase Employee SEC Defines 'Digital Assets' as Securities in Complaint
entry.summary: Former Coinbase product manager Ishan Wahi and two associates have been charged for allegedly front-running token listings.

entry.summary: Curve is likely to launch an overcollateralized stablecoin.
